citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30 am to 10
am on 19-May-17.
During this time, the inspector waited at the facility and called all available phone numbers on file leaving a
message.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

During this time, the inspector waited at the facility and called all available phone numbers on file leaving a
